about_the_game:
You can purchase the Divine Dragon mount from the Lord God Store. The Divine Dragon has unique innate skills, top - tier mount attributes, and the most stunning appearance.

Weapon: Divine Dragon Sword (Two - Handed Sword)

Golden Bloodline: Favored by the Dragon God

Effect 1: Each attack has a 15% chance to trigger the power of the Dragon God, increasing your critical hit rate by 100% for 5 seconds. This effect can stack up to 1 layer.

Effect 2: Each critical hit restores 1% of your health, with a 2 - second cooldown.

Effect 3: Critical hit damage is increased by 50%.

PS: The term "million" has no relation to the content. It mainly pays homage to the divine dragon mounts in some role - playing online games in China. Players need to spend millions of RMB to obtain the right to use them. Some players are willing to pay for this divine dragon to show their uniqueness in the game.

However, in our game, you can directly exchange it with points at the Lord God Store when your level is 5 or above, without spending real - world currency.

This DLC mainly features mount appearances and bloodlines. Please be cautious or refrain from purchasing if you have high requirements for content volume.
